channel.title: Happy New Year – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: Happy New Year 2013
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: I wanted to say “Thank You” to all of Angry Bear readers, contributors, and commentors, who make Angry Bear such a deeply rewarding endeavor for me. It is a labor of love for all involved. Here is wishing everyone a healthy, happy and rewarding 2013!
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to say “Thank You” to all of Angry Bear readers, contributors, and commentors, who make Angry Bear such a deeply rewarding endeavor for me. It is a labor of love for all involved.

Here is wishing everyone a healthy, happy and rewarding 2013!
